tourPackageDetails.documentsRequiredForTravel:
• ADULT: Voters ID / Passport / Aadhar Card / Driving Licence
  • ID card, ID card type and ID card number is mandatory at time of booking, kindly carry the same ID card on tour.
  • For NRI and Foreign National Guests alongwith Passport, Valid Indian Visa/ OCI Card/ PIO Card is mandatory.
  • Carry two passport size photos.
tourPackageDetails.exclusions:
• GST Extra
  • Air/Train Fare
  • Entry Tickets Fees
  • Personal Expenses
  • Anything that is not included in Inclusion
tourPackageDetails.thingsToCarryAlong:
• 03 Passport Size Photos
  • 03 photocopies of Adhar card/ Driving License/ Voter ID / Passport
  • Mobile phone with appropriate sim card
  • Along with your necessary clothing and toiletries carry face masks, sun screen lotion, hand sanitizer, sun glasses, cap, sports shoes, umbrella / windcheater, camera etc. and woollens if needed
    • If on medication, carry sufficient stock of medicines with prescription.

tourPackageDetails.tourRequirement:
• ADULT: Adhar card/ Driving License/ Voter ID / Passport
  • CHILD 5 – 11: Adhar card/ School ID / Passport
  • CHILD 2 – 4: School Id/ Birth Certificate/ Passport
  • INFANT: Birth Certificate/ Passport
  • 01 Passport size photo on system
tourPackageDetails.weather: • For detailed Information about weather kindly visit www.accuweather.com

travelItinerary.dayInformation: Pick up from Delhi cantt railway station at 6.30 am & depart for Shimla .Approx 350kms/10-12hrs drive for your onward journey.
After Lunch,Proceed to Kufri,Enjoy Horse Riding at Kufri (Own cost) & Back to hotel.
Shimila Mini train (own expanse), Sankat Mochan Hanuman mandir and visit Mall Road and Return to Hotel.
Early Morning 7:00AM, Move towards Manali (Aprox 270 Km/ 10 hrs )
travelItinerary.fromto: Shimla to Manali Aprox 270 Km/ 10 hrs

travelItinerary.dayInformation: Manali Local sightseen like Hidimba devi Temple , Hot Water Kund and then after sopping at Mall Road. back to hotel and Rest
Early Morning 7:00AM, Visit to Snow point/ Rohtang pass and Return to Hotel
Early Morning 6:00AM, Move toward Delhousie (aprox 370 KM/ 14 hrs)
travelItinerary.fromto: Manali To Delhousie aprox 370 KM/ 14 hrs

travelItinerary.dayInformation: Local Sightseen Delhousie, and after Lunch Visit to Khajjiar and return back to Hotel.

After Breakfast at Delhousie, Early Morning Visit to Amaritsar Wagah Border then after as per time availability visit Golden Temple , Jaliya Wala Bag by own expense in auto. And reach to Railway Station / Air Port and Tour End.

tourPackageDetails.tourDetailInclusion:
• Accommodation on a sharing basis
  • Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner cooked by our Maharaj (Pure Veg.)
  • All transfers & sightseeing by Non A/C 2×2 bus
  • Services of our tour manager
